title: R.I.P
body:
For a year and a bit now AP YI has been extinguished from the game of League of Legends, and all i ask is to pay a remembrance to our fallen OP ASF champion build, you will be missed but never forgotten old friend. I will miss the instant pentakills you brought to our game.

R.I.P AP YI 2009-2013 ;(

BTW this came to me as I played YI and suddenly remember my memories with AP YI... THIS IS A COMPLETELY OUT OF THE BLUE DISCUSSION 

ty for listening

replies.body: LOL ap yi was toxic asf op bs. Why would you even be sad of a cancer causing tuma being removed
Lol because he was fun to play as AP i just realised how much i missed him when i played him AD, it wasnt nearly as much fun as AP YI
